Xiao-Ming Wu (伍晓鸣)

M.S. Student, ISEE laboratory

Computer Science, School of Computer Science and Engineering

Sun Yet-Sen University


Email: wuxiaoming.alg@gmail.com

Biography

I am currently a master student at Sun Yet-Sen University. As a graduate student, I follow Professor Wei-Shi Zheng and mainly work on computer vision.

During my undergraduate study in Shandong University, I worked with Assistant Professor Xin Luo and Professor Xin-Shun Xu, mainly worked on hashing retrieval.

Education

  • Master in Computer Science
    2022-now
    Sun Yet-Sen University
  • Bachelor in Software Engineering (ranking 1/354, honorable bachelor)
    2018-2022
    Shandong University

Research Interest

  • Computer Vision
  • Machine Learning

Publication

    In: ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management (CIKM), 2022

    Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo*, Yu-Wei Zhan, Chen-Lu Ding, Zhen-Duo Chen, Xin-Shun Xu.

    Yu-Wei Zhan, Yong-Xin Wang, Yu Sun, Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo*, and Xin-Shun Xu.
